src:
Urgent: IBK limoge son Conseiller Technique en charge de la Communication, Tiegoum Boubèye Maiga
05 Nov 2019 by bamada.net



Tiegoum Boubèye Maiga, le jeune frère de l’ancien PM est limogé. Il serait accompagné de Mamadou Camara, l’attaché à la Presse de la communication de Koulouba.




Koulouba.com
text:
Urgent: IBK sacked his Technical Advisor in charge of Communication, Tiegoum Boubèye Maiga
05 Nov 2019 by bamada.net



Tiegoum Boubèye Maiga, the younger brother of the former PM is sacked. He would be accompanied by Mamadou Camara, the attaché to the Koulouba Communication Press.




Koulouba.com
